mapper.select: SELECT bc.idx, bc.boardIdx, bc.comment, u.name AS writerId, bc.createAt AS createAt FROM stn_board_comment bc, stn_users u WHERE bc.boardIdx = #{boardIdx} AND bc.writerId = u.userId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stn_board_comment (boardIdx, comment, writerId, createAt) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{comment}, #{writerId}, NOW())
